name: Lost Dice (GPinkyDev)
description:
You need to collect all the missing dice! But collecting a dice piece changes your current ability.  Made by: PinkyThreatDEV and GPinkyDev, this is our first game jam!

Backspace - pause 

WASD - Move

Mouse - Look

Space - Jump

Shift - Dash

Wall Climb - Hold space near a wall and release space to jump
